attributes.action: A General Election when he stands down as he has not fulfilled his election promise of going another full term .Mr brown doesn't have the right to be the primeminister as the people didn't elect him and labour MPs represent the people not themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to act now or we will be railroaded into having Mr Brown and the majority of the British people don't want him.
